mapper.sql: OWNERLIST_ID, OWNERLOG_ID, EQUIP_ID, EQUIP_NO, FACTORY_NO, EQUIP_NAME, MODEL_NO, SPEC, EQUIP_STATUAS_CODE, EQUIP_TYPE_ID, EQUIP_TYPE_NAME, RECEIVE_STATUS, RECEIVE_TIME, ORIGINAL_POSITION_ID, ORIGINAL_POSITION_NAME, NEW_POSITION_ID, NEW_POSITION_NAME,MEMO

distinct
from lims_equip_ownerlist
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into lims_equip_ownerlist (OWNERLIST_ID, OWNERLOG_ID, EQUIP_ID, EQUIP_NO, FACTORY_NO, EQUIP_NAME, MODEL_NO, SPEC, EQUIP_STATUAS_CODE, EQUIP_TYPE_ID, EQUIP_TYPE_NAME, RECEIVE_STATUS, RECEIVE_TIME, ORIGINAL_POSITION_ID, ORIGINAL_POSITION_NAME, NEW_POSITION_ID, NEW_POSITION_NAME,MEMO ) values (#{ownerlistId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ownerlogId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{equipId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{equipNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{factoryNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equipName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modelNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equipStatuasId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equipTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{equipTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiveStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{originalPositionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{originalPositionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{newPositionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{newPositionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

update lims_equip_ownerlist
OWNERLIST_ID = #{record.ownerlistId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
OWNERLOG_ID = #{record.ownerlogId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
EQUIP_ID = #{record.equipId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
EQUIP_NO = #{record.equipNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FACTORY_NO = #{record.factoryNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EQUIP_NAME = #{record.equipName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODEL_NO = #{record.modelNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SPEC = #{record.spec,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EQUIP_STATUAS_CODE = #{record.equipStatuasId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EQUIP_TYPE_ID = #{record.equipTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
EQUIP_TYPE_NAME = #{record.equipTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

RECEIVE_TIME = #{record.receiveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

ORIGINAL_POSITION_NAME = #{record.originalPositionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NEW_POSITION_ID = #{record.newPositionId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
NEW_POSITION_NAME = #{record.newPositionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update lims_equip_ownerlist
OWNERLOG_ID = #{ownerlogId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
EQUIP_ID = #{equipId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
EQUIP_NO = #{equipNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FACTORY_NO = #{factoryNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EQUIP_NAME = #{equipName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODEL_NO = #{modelNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SPEC = #{spec,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EQUIP_STATUAS_CODE = #{equipStatuasId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EQUIP_TYPE_ID = #{equipTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
EQUIP_TYPE_NAME = #{equipTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RECEIVE_STATUS = #{receiveStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RECEIVE_TIME = #{receiveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ORIGINAL_POSITION_ID = #{originalPositionId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ORIGINAL_POSITION_NAME = #{originalPositionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NEW_POSITION_ID = #{newPositionId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
NEW_POSITION_NAME = #{newPositionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEMO = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where OWNERLIST_ID = #{ownerlistId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
